QuestData.Title: Prove your Worth
QuestData.Description:
See many Alliance out there, $r? We're getting reports of more and more Alliance showing up here on Zandalar.
Don't forget that this is a W-A-R. Prove your worth, and get out there and slay as many of them as you can.
For the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Enable War Mode and slay 1 Alliance Player within the world.
